issues.title: LA Homeless State of Emergency
issues.description: South LA received less than 11% of the 2007 Los Angeles Continuum of Care Grant Awards and had the second lowest ratio of grant dollars per homeless person ($607).  South LA has the highest percentage of its  homeless population who are unsheltered (91%) – compared to 83% of the entire County’s homeless population.

issues.title: Provide a better education for next generations
issues.description: Statistics show people who are living in south LA have lower education than other cities. As a result, it causes of poor labor market outcomes .People only able to find low paid jobs
